task.summary: Default task
More bug fixes, incl'ng tagging of recipes
Tweaked recipe popover
Thumbnails now work properly and recipe images load sensibly, even if there's no thumbnail or the thumbnail is pending. Thumbnail production and URL checking now done in background
Got aggregates analytics table on its feet, though requiring double-check of figures
Individual and aggregate user data split into separate pages and added to admin page; added tags and tags-per-recipe to user-data page
Recipe editing dialog fixed.
Added magnifying-glass icon to git
Magnifying-glass no longer shows in closeup recipe view
Closeup recipe view has image again, and is larger
Syntax error
Same syntax error, more places
Eliminated gratuitous image resizes, improved pic_picker loading, solidified stream handling in collection
Fixed Max's invitation bug
Modal recipe dialog works and preserves original URL
Hashtag navigation up and running
Saving and restoring of recipe pages
History for recipe pages seems to work
Reformatted tag page
Infinite Scrolling, v. 1

MESSAGE.value: More bug fixes, incl'ng tagging of recipes
Thumbnails now work properly and recipe images load sensibly, even if there's no thumbnail or the thumbnail is pending. Thumbnail production and URL checking now done in background
Got aggregates analytics table on its feet, though requiring double-check of figures
Individual and aggregate user data split into separate pages and added to admin page; added tags and tags-per-recipe to user-data page
Magnifying-glass no longer shows in closeup recipe view
Closeup recipe view has image again, and is larger
Eliminated gratuitous image resizes, improved pic_picker loading, solidified stream handling in collection
Modal recipe dialog works and preserves original URL
Saving and restoring of recipe pages
History for recipe pages seems to work
